messages.body: Hi, I'm having trouble downloading the ebook I just purchased. The download link isn't working

Hi there,

I apologize for the trouble with your download. I can see that your purchase was successful. Sometimes clearing your browser cache can help with download issues. If that doesn't work, I can generate a new download link for you.

Please let me know if you need any further assistance!

Best regards,
Sarah
I tried clearing my cache but it's still not working. Could you please send me a new download link?
